trans-unit.source: Specifies the XSLT features to support during execution of the XSLT style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Especifica as funcionalidades XSLT para suportar durante a execução da folha de estilo de XSLT.

trans-unit.source: Embedded script blocks and the XSLT `document()` function are optional features on the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: Incorporado blocos de script e o XSLT `document()` função são funcionalidades opcionais de <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>classe.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>

trans-unit.source: These features are disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: Estas funcionalidades estão desativadas por predefinição.

trans-unit.source: The XsltSettings class specifies which of these optional features to support.
trans-unit.target: A classe de XsltSettings Especifica qual destas funcionalidades opcionais para suportar.

trans-unit.source: Features are enabled or disabled using the class properties.
trans-unit.target: Funcionalidades estão ativadas ou desativadas utilizando as propriedades de classe.

trans-unit.source: The XsltSettings object is then passed to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de XsltSettings é então passado para o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > XSLT style sheets can include references to other files and embedded script blocks.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Folhas de estilo XSLT podem incluir referências a outros ficheiros e incorporados blocos de script.

trans-unit.source: A malicious user can exploit this by supplying you with data or style sheets that when executed can cause your system to process until the computer runs low on resources.
trans-unit.target: Um utilizador mal intencionado pode explorar esta fornecendo, com dados ou folhas de estilos que quando executado pode fazer com que o sistema para processar até que o computador que executa baixo nos recursos.

trans-unit.source: Do not enable scripting or the `document()` function unless the style sheet comes from a trusted source.
trans-unit.target: Não ative o scripting ou `document()` funcione, a menos que a folha de estilo provém de uma origem fidedigna.

trans-unit.source: If you cannot verify the source of the style sheet, or if the style sheet does not come from a trusted source, use the default XSLT settings.
trans-unit.target: Se não conseguir verificar a origem da folha de estilo, ou se a folha de estilo não forem provenientes de uma origem fidedigna, utilize as predefinições de XSLT.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings"></xref> class with default settings.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings"> </xref> classe com as predefinições.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings> object does not support the XSLT `document()` function or embedded script blocks.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings>objecto não suporta o XSLT `document()` function ou blocos de script incorporado.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > XSLT scripting should be enabled only if you require script support and you are working in a fully trusted environment.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > XSLT scripting deve ser ativada apenas se necessitar de suporte de scripts e estiver a trabalhar num ambiente totalmente fidedigno.

trans-unit.source: If you enable the `document()` function, you can restrict the resources that can be accessed by passing an <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> object to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se ativar o `document()` função, pode restringir os recursos que podem ser acedidos através da transmissão de um <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver>de objeto para o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A>método.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings"></xref> class with the specified settings.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings"> </xref> classe com as definições especificadas.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable support for the XSLT `document()` function; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para ativar o suporte para o XSLT `document()` funcionar; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable support for embedded scripts blocks; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para ativar o suporte de blocos de scripts incorporados; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings"></xref> object with default settings.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings"> </xref> objeto com as predefinições.

trans-unit.source: Support for the XSLT `document()` function and embedded script blocks is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Suporte para o XSLT `document()` função e o script incorporado blocos está desativada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings"></xref> object with the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings.EnableDocumentFunction*> and <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings.EnableScript*> properties set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings"> </xref> objeto com o <> </> *> e <> </> *> as propriedades definidas como <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable support for the XSLT `document()` function.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se pretende ativar o suporte para o XSLT `document()` função.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to support the XSLT `document()` function; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para suportar o XSLT `document()` funcionar; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable support for embedded script blocks.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se pretende ativar o suporte para blocos de script incorporado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to support script blocks in XSLT style sheets; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para suportar os blocos de script de folhas de estilo XSLT; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings"></xref> object that enables support for the XSLT `document()` function and embedded script blocks.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings"> </xref> objeto que ativa o suporte para o XSLT `document()` função e blocos de script incorporado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings"></xref> object with the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings.EnableDocumentFunction*> and <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings.EnableScript*> properties set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings"> </xref> objeto com o <> </> *> e <> </> *> as propriedades definidas como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
